name: Battleship Bully
description:
Made for the Wowie 4.0 Jam 8/15/2022

Play as an Artificial Intelligent robot in a real-time game of battleship. Get ahead of the competition by dragging your ships away from harm and storing your opponents pegs to fling back at them.

WASD: Move
Space: Jump
Press E: grab an abject, press E a second time to release it
